Text.Page:
I know Heroth's trying, but there's only so much they can do. Eventually, the orcans are going to stop debating and overrun us. My daughter deserves better than that.

If you could take out a couple handfuls of the {@LinkCreature:7#7#Red Fang ragers} and their minions, the {@LinkCreature:7#8#Red Fang kobolds}, the rest would fall upon each other trying to establish dominance.

It's not a permanent solution, but we're living hour by hour here.

Our farm should be safer, for now at least. Perhaps Abelia will have one night of undisturbed sleep.

Thanks. Heroth and Drustan haven't given up here and neither have I. We'll make this valley green again, as my wife likes to say, and fates be damned.
